topInsights.title: App Adoption is the Strongest Retention Lever
topInsights.description: Customers who adopt the VoltEdge app churn at 12.3% versus 28.7% for non-app users. App adoption also correlates with higher lifetime value and faster repeat purchases.

topInsights.title: First Repeat Purchase Happens Quickly — If It Happens
topInsights.description: Among customers who make a second purchase, the median time to repeat purchase is just 2.5 months. However, over 73% of customers never reach this second transaction.

topInsights.title: Multi-Category Buyers Drive Ecosystem Value
topInsights.description: Only 15% of non-app users purchase across multiple categories, compared to 31% of app users. Multi-category buyers show materially lower churn and higher lifetime value.
